product_reviews.title: SIMPLY DELICIOUS!!
product_reviews.content: I tried this flavor a couple weeks ago, and it is sooooo good. It tastes similar to a dr.pepper but without all the extra sugar and other ingredients no one can pronounce. product_reviews.title: Meh

product_reviews.title: Just Like Cough Syrup
product_reviews.content: I tried just one can hoping it might be a little like Dr Pepper. Was so surprised at how sweet it is. And like a few have said, it tastes like medicine or more specifically Robitussin cough syrup. Ugh.

product_reviews.title: Dr Pepper Addict
product_reviews.content: I’ve been trying to find a replacement for my Dr Pepper addiction. While the flavor isn’t the same, it gets me my fix. The probiotics cause a bit of a rumbly stomach so just a heads up!

product_reviews.title: Just Right
product_reviews.content: I recently gave up traditional soda, but I still craved that satisfying carbonation. Enter Poppi! It’s the ultimate game changer delicious, refreshing, and the perfect soda alternative. With no more than 5 grams of sugar and amazing flavor, it checks all the boxes! The Doc Pop flavor? Absolutely incredible. Poppi is my new obsession!

product_reviews.title: Buy on repeat!
product_reviews.content: Cherry Lime is my favorite Poppi beverage flavor! The orange and strawberry lemonade are also good, but this one 😘! Besides being a fun sparkly beverage, Poppi has a bit of health properties, also. It contains PRE-biotic fiber, very low sugar content, no artificial coloring or flavors! I capitalized the PRE because, at first, I thought it was a PRO-biotic drink (that would be the Kombucha drinks!). 🤔 Both probiotics and prebiotics are important, so now I have two types of fun, healthy, sparkly beverages! Woohoo! 🥳 If you have already weaned yourself off of high sugar sodas, and your tastebuds have had a break, I think you will enjoy Poppi sodas, not just as a healthier alternative, but as a delicious treat. 🎉 I really like Poppi’s Cherry Lime flavor. (I like it even better when it’s on sale! 😊). I am a repeat buyer and I recommend this! ⭐️ 👍 💯

product_reviews.title: Refreshing and Gut-friendly delight
product_reviews.content: I recently had the pleasure of trying the Poppi Cherry Lime Prebiotic Soda, and it has quickly become a staple in my beverage lineup. Here's why I'm hooked: Flavor Explosion: The cherry and lime combination is a burst of refreshing goodness. The balance between the tartness of the cherry and the citrusy kick from lime creates a delightful and unique flavor profile. It's not overly sweet, making it a perfect alternative to traditional sodas. Gut Health Boost: What sets Poppi apart is its focus on gut health. Packed with prebiotics, this soda not only satisfies your taste buds but also supports your digestive system. It's a guilt-free indulgence that adds a healthy twist to my beverage choices. Light and Bubbly: The carbonation is just right – not too overpowering, but enough to give that satisfying fizz. It's incredibly light on the palate, making it an ideal companion for any occasion, whether it's a midday pick-me-up or a refreshing beverage during meals. Natural Ingredients: I appreciate that Poppi uses natural ingredients and doesn't compromise on quality. The absence of artificial flavors and colors is evident in the soda's pure and authentic taste. Stylish Packaging: The sleek and vibrant packaging is visually appealing and stands out on the shelves. It's a bonus that the can is easily recyclable, contributing to a more sustainable beverage choice. In conclusion, Poppi Cherry Lime Prebiotic Soda has won me over with its fantastic flavor, health benefits, and commitment to quality. It's a guilt-free treat that I can enjoy without compromising on taste or well-being. I highly recommend giving it a try – your taste buds and gut will thank you!

product_reviews.title: Buy on repeat!
product_reviews.content: Cherry Lime is my favorite Poppi beverage flavor! The orange and strawberry lemonade are also good, but this one 😘! Besides being a fun sparkly beverage, Poppi has a bit of health properties, also. It contains PRE-biotic fiber, very low sugar content, no artificial coloring or flavors! I capitalized the PRE because, at first, I thought it was a PRO-biotic drink (that would be the Kombucha drinks!). 🤔 Both probiotics and prebiotics are important, so now I have two types of fun, healthy, sparkly beverages! Woohoo! 🥳 If you have already weaned yourself off of high sugar sodas, and your tastebuds have had a break, I think you will enjoy Poppi sodas, not just as a healthier alternative, but as a delicious treat. 🎉 I really like Poppi’s Cherry Lime flavor. (I like it even better when it’s on sale! 😊). I am a repeat buyer and I recommend this! ⭐️ 👍 💯

product_reviews.title: Refreshing and Gut-friendly delight
product_reviews.content: I recently had the pleasure of trying the Poppi Cherry Lime Prebiotic Soda, and it has quickly become a staple in my beverage lineup. Here's why I'm hooked: Flavor Explosion: The cherry and lime combination is a burst of refreshing goodness. The balance between the tartness of the cherry and the citrusy kick from lime creates a delightful and unique flavor profile. It's not overly sweet, making it a perfect alternative to traditional sodas. Gut Health Boost: What sets Poppi apart is its focus on gut health. Packed with prebiotics, this soda not only satisfies your taste buds but also supports your digestive system. It's a guilt-free indulgence that adds a healthy twist to my beverage choices. Light and Bubbly: The carbonation is just right – not too overpowering, but enough to give that satisfying fizz. It's incredibly light on the palate, making it an ideal companion for any occasion, whether it's a midday pick-me-up or a refreshing beverage during meals. Natural Ingredients: I appreciate that Poppi uses natural ingredients and doesn't compromise on quality. The absence of artificial flavors and colors is evident in the soda's pure and authentic taste. Stylish Packaging: The sleek and vibrant packaging is visually appealing and stands out on the shelves. It's a bonus that the can is easily recyclable, contributing to a more sustainable beverage choice. In conclusion, Poppi Cherry Lime Prebiotic Soda has won me over with its fantastic flavor, health benefits, and commitment to quality. It's a guilt-free treat that I can enjoy without compromising on taste or well-being. I highly recommend giving it a try – your taste buds and gut will thank you!

product_reviews.title: Buy on repeat!
product_reviews.content: Cherry Lime is my favorite Poppi beverage flavor! The orange and strawberry lemonade are also good, but this one 😘! Besides being a fun sparkly beverage, Poppi has a bit of health properties, also. It contains PRE-biotic fiber, very low sugar content, no artificial coloring or flavors! I capitalized the PRE because, at first, I thought it was a PRO-biotic drink (that would be the Kombucha drinks!). 🤔 Both probiotics and prebiotics are important, so now I have two types of fun, healthy, sparkly beverages! Woohoo! 🥳 If you have already weaned yourself off of high sugar sodas, and your tastebuds have had a break, I think you will enjoy Poppi sodas, not just as a healthier alternative, but as a delicious treat. 🎉 I really like Poppi’s Cherry Lime flavor. (I like it even better when it’s on sale! 😊). I am a repeat buyer and I recommend this! ⭐️ 👍 💯

product_reviews.title: Refreshing and Gut-friendly delight
product_reviews.content: I recently had the pleasure of trying the Poppi Cherry Lime Prebiotic Soda, and it has quickly become a staple in my beverage lineup. Here's why I'm hooked: Flavor Explosion: The cherry and lime combination is a burst of refreshing goodness. The balance between the tartness of the cherry and the citrusy kick from lime creates a delightful and unique flavor profile. It's not overly sweet, making it a perfect alternative to traditional sodas. Gut Health Boost: What sets Poppi apart is its focus on gut health. Packed with prebiotics, this soda not only satisfies your taste buds but also supports your digestive system. It's a guilt-free indulgence that adds a healthy twist to my beverage choices. Light and Bubbly: The carbonation is just right – not too overpowering, but enough to give that satisfying fizz. It's incredibly light on the palate, making it an ideal companion for any occasion, whether it's a midday pick-me-up or a refreshing beverage during meals. Natural Ingredients: I appreciate that Poppi uses natural ingredients and doesn't compromise on quality. The absence of artificial flavors and colors is evident in the soda's pure and authentic taste. Stylish Packaging: The sleek and vibrant packaging is visually appealing and stands out on the shelves. It's a bonus that the can is easily recyclable, contributing to a more sustainable beverage choice. In conclusion, Poppi Cherry Lime Prebiotic Soda has won me over with its fantastic flavor, health benefits, and commitment to quality. It's a guilt-free treat that I can enjoy without compromising on taste or well-being. I highly recommend giving it a try – your taste buds and gut will thank you!

product_reviews.title: Buy on repeat!
product_reviews.content: Cherry Lime is my favorite Poppi beverage flavor! The orange and strawberry lemonade are also good, but this one 😘! Besides being a fun sparkly beverage, Poppi has a bit of health properties, also. It contains PRE-biotic fiber, very low sugar content, no artificial coloring or flavors! I capitalized the PRE because, at first, I thought it was a PRO-biotic drink (that would be the Kombucha drinks!). 🤔 Both probiotics and prebiotics are important, so now I have two types of fun, healthy, sparkly beverages! Woohoo! 🥳 If you have already weaned yourself off of high sugar sodas, and your tastebuds have had a break, I think you will enjoy Poppi sodas, not just as a healthier alternative, but as a delicious treat. 🎉 I really like Poppi’s Cherry Lime flavor. (I like it even better when it’s on sale! 😊). I am a repeat buyer and I recommend this! ⭐️ 👍 💯

product_reviews.title: Refreshing and Gut-friendly delight
product_reviews.content: I recently had the pleasure of trying the Poppi Cherry Lime Prebiotic Soda, and it has quickly become a staple in my beverage lineup. Here's why I'm hooked: Flavor Explosion: The cherry and lime combination is a burst of refreshing goodness. The balance between the tartness of the cherry and the citrusy kick from lime creates a delightful and unique flavor profile. It's not overly sweet, making it a perfect alternative to traditional sodas. Gut Health Boost: What sets Poppi apart is its focus on gut health. Packed with prebiotics, this soda not only satisfies your taste buds but also supports your digestive system. It's a guilt-free indulgence that adds a healthy twist to my beverage choices. Light and Bubbly: The carbonation is just right – not too overpowering, but enough to give that satisfying fizz. It's incredibly light on the palate, making it an ideal companion for any occasion, whether it's a midday pick-me-up or a refreshing beverage during meals. Natural Ingredients: I appreciate that Poppi uses natural ingredients and doesn't compromise on quality. The absence of artificial flavors and colors is evident in the soda's pure and authentic taste. Stylish Packaging: The sleek and vibrant packaging is visually appealing and stands out on the shelves. It's a bonus that the can is easily recyclable, contributing to a more sustainable beverage choice. In conclusion, Poppi Cherry Lime Prebiotic Soda has won me over with its fantastic flavor, health benefits, and commitment to quality. It's a guilt-free treat that I can enjoy without compromising on taste or well-being. I highly recommend giving it a try – your taste buds and gut will thank you!

product_reviews.title: Buy on repeat!
product_reviews.content: Cherry Lime is my favorite Poppi beverage flavor! The orange and strawberry lemonade are also good, but this one 😘! Besides being a fun sparkly beverage, Poppi has a bit of health properties, also. It contains PRE-biotic fiber, very low sugar content, no artificial coloring or flavors! I capitalized the PRE because, at first, I thought it was a PRO-biotic drink (that would be the Kombucha drinks!). 🤔 Both probiotics and prebiotics are important, so now I have two types of fun, healthy, sparkly beverages! Woohoo! 🥳 If you have already weaned yourself off of high sugar sodas, and your tastebuds have had a break, I think you will enjoy Poppi sodas, not just as a healthier alternative, but as a delicious treat. 🎉 I really like Poppi’s Cherry Lime flavor. (I like it even better when it’s on sale! 😊). I am a repeat buyer and I recommend this! ⭐️ 👍 💯

product_reviews.title: Refreshing and Gut-friendly delight
product_reviews.content: I recently had the pleasure of trying the Poppi Cherry Lime Prebiotic Soda, and it has quickly become a staple in my beverage lineup. Here's why I'm hooked: Flavor Explosion: The cherry and lime combination is a burst of refreshing goodness. The balance between the tartness of the cherry and the citrusy kick from lime creates a delightful and unique flavor profile. It's not overly sweet, making it a perfect alternative to traditional sodas. Gut Health Boost: What sets Poppi apart is its focus on gut health. Packed with prebiotics, this soda not only satisfies your taste buds but also supports your digestive system. It's a guilt-free indulgence that adds a healthy twist to my beverage choices. Light and Bubbly: The carbonation is just right – not too overpowering, but enough to give that satisfying fizz. It's incredibly light on the palate, making it an ideal companion for any occasion, whether it's a midday pick-me-up or a refreshing beverage during meals. Natural Ingredients: I appreciate that Poppi uses natural ingredients and doesn't compromise on quality. The absence of artificial flavors and colors is evident in the soda's pure and authentic taste. Stylish Packaging: The sleek and vibrant packaging is visually appealing and stands out on the shelves. It's a bonus that the can is easily recyclable, contributing to a more sustainable beverage choice. In conclusion, Poppi Cherry Lime Prebiotic Soda has won me over with its fantastic flavor, health benefits, and commitment to quality. It's a guilt-free treat that I can enjoy without compromising on taste or well-being. I highly recommend giving it a try – your taste buds and gut will thank you!

product_reviews.title: Buy on repeat!
product_reviews.content: Cherry Lime is my favorite Poppi beverage flavor! The orange and strawberry lemonade are also good, but this one 😘! Besides being a fun sparkly beverage, Poppi has a bit of health properties, also. It contains PRE-biotic fiber, very low sugar content, no artificial coloring or flavors! I capitalized the PRE because, at first, I thought it was a PRO-biotic drink (that would be the Kombucha drinks!). 🤔 Both probiotics and prebiotics are important, so now I have two types of fun, healthy, sparkly beverages! Woohoo! 🥳 If you have already weaned yourself off of high sugar sodas, and your tastebuds have had a break, I think you will enjoy Poppi sodas, not just as a healthier alternative, but as a delicious treat. 🎉 I really like Poppi’s Cherry Lime flavor. (I like it even better when it’s on sale! 😊). I am a repeat buyer and I recommend this! ⭐️ 👍 💯

product_reviews.title: Refreshing and Gut-friendly delight
product_reviews.content: I recently had the pleasure of trying the Poppi Cherry Lime Prebiotic Soda, and it has quickly become a staple in my beverage lineup. Here's why I'm hooked: Flavor Explosion: The cherry and lime combination is a burst of refreshing goodness. The balance between the tartness of the cherry and the citrusy kick from lime creates a delightful and unique flavor profile. It's not overly sweet, making it a perfect alternative to traditional sodas. Gut Health Boost: What sets Poppi apart is its focus on gut health. Packed with prebiotics, this soda not only satisfies your taste buds but also supports your digestive system. It's a guilt-free indulgence that adds a healthy twist to my beverage choices. Light and Bubbly: The carbonation is just right – not too overpowering, but enough to give that satisfying fizz. It's incredibly light on the palate, making it an ideal companion for any occasion, whether it's a midday pick-me-up or a refreshing beverage during meals. Natural Ingredients: I appreciate that Poppi uses natural ingredients and doesn't compromise on quality. The absence of artificial flavors and colors is evident in the soda's pure and authentic taste. Stylish Packaging: The sleek and vibrant packaging is visually appealing and stands out on the shelves. It's a bonus that the can is easily recyclable, contributing to a more sustainable beverage choice. In conclusion, Poppi Cherry Lime Prebiotic Soda has won me over with its fantastic flavor, health benefits, and commitment to quality. It's a guilt-free treat that I can enjoy without compromising on taste or well-being. I highly recommend giving it a try – your taste buds and gut will thank you!

product_reviews.title: Buy on repeat!
product_reviews.content: Cherry Lime is my favorite Poppi beverage flavor! The orange and strawberry lemonade are also good, but this one 😘! Besides being a fun sparkly beverage, Poppi has a bit of health properties, also. It contains PRE-biotic fiber, very low sugar content, no artificial coloring or flavors! I capitalized the PRE because, at first, I thought it was a PRO-biotic drink (that would be the Kombucha drinks!). 🤔 Both probiotics and prebiotics are important, so now I have two types of fun, healthy, sparkly beverages! Woohoo! 🥳 If you have already weaned yourself off of high sugar sodas, and your tastebuds have had a break, I think you will enjoy Poppi sodas, not just as a healthier alternative, but as a delicious treat. 🎉 I really like Poppi’s Cherry Lime flavor. (I like it even better when it’s on sale! 😊). I am a repeat buyer and I recommend this! ⭐️ 👍 💯

product_reviews.title: Refreshing and Gut-friendly delight
product_reviews.content: I recently had the pleasure of trying the Poppi Cherry Lime Prebiotic Soda, and it has quickly become a staple in my beverage lineup. Here's why I'm hooked: Flavor Explosion: The cherry and lime combination is a burst of refreshing goodness. The balance between the tartness of the cherry and the citrusy kick from lime creates a delightful and unique flavor profile. It's not overly sweet, making it a perfect alternative to traditional sodas. Gut Health Boost: What sets Poppi apart is its focus on gut health. Packed with prebiotics, this soda not only satisfies your taste buds but also supports your digestive system. It's a guilt-free indulgence that adds a healthy twist to my beverage choices. Light and Bubbly: The carbonation is just right – not too overpowering, but enough to give that satisfying fizz. It's incredibly light on the palate, making it an ideal companion for any occasion, whether it's a midday pick-me-up or a refreshing beverage during meals. Natural Ingredients: I appreciate that Poppi uses natural ingredients and doesn't compromise on quality. The absence of artificial flavors and colors is evident in the soda's pure and authentic taste. Stylish Packaging: The sleek and vibrant packaging is visually appealing and stands out on the shelves. It's a bonus that the can is easily recyclable, contributing to a more sustainable beverage choice. In conclusion, Poppi Cherry Lime Prebiotic Soda has won me over with its fantastic flavor, health benefits, and commitment to quality. It's a guilt-free treat that I can enjoy without compromising on taste or well-being. I highly recommend giving it a try – your taste buds and gut will thank you!

product_reviews.title: Buy on repeat!
product_reviews.content: Cherry Lime is my favorite Poppi beverage flavor! The orange and strawberry lemonade are also good, but this one 😘! Besides being a fun sparkly beverage, Poppi has a bit of health properties, also. It contains PRE-biotic fiber, very low sugar content, no artificial coloring or flavors! I capitalized the PRE because, at first, I thought it was a PRO-biotic drink (that would be the Kombucha drinks!). 🤔 Both probiotics and prebiotics are important, so now I have two types of fun, healthy, sparkly beverages! Woohoo! 🥳 If you have already weaned yourself off of high sugar sodas, and your tastebuds have had a break, I think you will enjoy Poppi sodas, not just as a healthier alternative, but as a delicious treat. 🎉 I really like Poppi’s Cherry Lime flavor. (I like it even better when it’s on sale! 😊). I am a repeat buyer and I recommend this! ⭐️ 👍 💯

product_reviews.title: Refreshing and Gut-friendly delight
product_reviews.content: I recently had the pleasure of trying the Poppi Cherry Lime Prebiotic Soda, and it has quickly become a staple in my beverage lineup. Here's why I'm hooked: Flavor Explosion: The cherry and lime combination is a burst of refreshing goodness. The balance between the tartness of the cherry and the citrusy kick from lime creates a delightful and unique flavor profile. It's not overly sweet, making it a perfect alternative to traditional sodas. Gut Health Boost: What sets Poppi apart is its focus on gut health. Packed with prebiotics, this soda not only satisfies your taste buds but also supports your digestive system. It's a guilt-free indulgence that adds a healthy twist to my beverage choices. Light and Bubbly: The carbonation is just right – not too overpowering, but enough to give that satisfying fizz. It's incredibly light on the palate, making it an ideal companion for any occasion, whether it's a midday pick-me-up or a refreshing beverage during meals. Natural Ingredients: I appreciate that Poppi uses natural ingredients and doesn't compromise on quality. The absence of artificial flavors and colors is evident in the soda's pure and authentic taste. Stylish Packaging: The sleek and vibrant packaging is visually appealing and stands out on the shelves. It's a bonus that the can is easily recyclable, contributing to a more sustainable beverage choice. In conclusion, Poppi Cherry Lime Prebiotic Soda has won me over with its fantastic flavor, health benefits, and commitment to quality. It's a guilt-free treat that I can enjoy without compromising on taste or well-being. I highly recommend giving it a try – your taste buds and gut will thank you!
